title: Excel Formatting and Font Modification Plan
content: Created a plan to guide the user on how to modify an Excel file to fix formatting issues and change the font to a professional one. The plan includes steps for analyzing the current formatting, changing the font, adjusting column widths and row heights, formatting numbers and dates, aligning data, applying cell styles, removing extra spaces, and reviewing the changes. Success criteria, risk assessment, and budget information are also included.
summary: Plan created to modify Excel file formatting and font.
